original_text: So Joshua took the entire land, just as the Lord had directed Moses, and he gave it as an inheritance to Israel according to their tribal divisions. Then the land had rest from war.
korean_text: 이와 같이 여호수아가 여호와께서 모세에게 말씀하신 대로 그 온 땅을 점령하여 이스라엘 지파의 구분에 따라 기업으로 주매 그 땅에 전쟁이 그쳤더라

sentences.original_text: So Joshua took the entire land
just as the Lord had directed Moses
and he gave it as an inheritance to Israel
Then the land had rest from war
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그 땅은 전쟁으로부터 평안을 누렸다
